verses.verse: He that dwelleth <WH3427> <WH8802> in the secret <WH5643> place of Ha `Elyon <WH5945> shall abide <WH3885> <WH8698> under the shadow <WH6738> of 'El SHaddai <WH7706>.
I will say <WH559> <WH8799> of the YY <WH3068>, He is my refuge <WH4268> and my fortress <WH4686>: my 'Elohim <WH430>; in him will I trust <WH982> <WH8799>.
Surely he shall deliver <WH5337> <WH8686> thee from the snare <WH6341> of the fowler <WH3353>, and from the noisome <WH1942> pestilence <WH1698>.
He shall cover <WH5526> <WH8686> thee with his feathers <WH84>, and under his wings <WH3671> shalt thou trust <WH2620> <WH8799>: his truth <WH571> shall be thy shield <WH6793> and buckler <WH5507>.
Thou shalt not be afraid <WH3372> <WH8799> for the terror <WH6343> by night <WH3915>; nor for the arrow <WH2671> that flieth <WH5774> <WH8799> by day <WH3119>;
Nor for the pestilence <WH1698> that walketh <WH1980> <WH8799> in darkness <WH652>; nor for the destruction <WH6986> that wasteth <WH7736> <WH8799> at noonday <WH6672>.
A thousand <WH505> shall fall <WH5307> <WH8799> at thy side <WH6654>, and ten thousand <WH7233> at thy right hand <WH3225>; but it shall not come nigh <WH5066> <WH8799> thee.
Only with thine eyes <WH5869> shalt thou behold <WH5027> <WH8686> and see <WH7200> <WH8799> the reward <WH8011> of the wicked <WH7563>.
Because thou hast made <WH7760> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068>, which is my refuge <WH4268>, even Ha `Elyon <WH5945>, thy habitation <WH4583>;
There shall no evil <WH7451> befall <WH579> <WH8792> thee, neither shall any plague <WH5061> come nigh <WH7126> <WH8799> thy dwelling <WH168>.
For he shall give his angels <WH4397> charge <WH6680> <WH8762> over thee, to keep <WH8104> <WH8800> thee in all thy ways <WH1870>.
They shall bear thee up <WH5375> <WH8799> in their hands <WH3709>, lest thou dash <WH5062> <WH8799> thy foot <WH7272> against a stone <WH68>.
Thou shalt tread <WH1869> <WH8799> upon the lion <WH7826> and adder <WH6620>: the young lion <WH3715> and the dragon <WH8577> shalt thou trample under feet <WH7429> <WH8799>.

Because he hath set his love <WH2836> <WH8804> upon me, therefore will I deliver <WH6403> <WH8762> him: I will set him on high <WH7682> <WH8762>, because he hath known <WH3045> <WH8804> my name <WH8034>.
He shall call <WH7121> <WH8799> upon me, and I will answer <WH6030> <WH8799> him: I will be with him in trouble <WH6869>; I will deliver <WH2502> <WH8762> him, and honour <WH3513> <WH8762> him.
With long <WH753> life <WH3117> will I satisfy <WH7646> <WH8686> him, and shew <WH7200> <WH8686> him my salvation <WH3444>.
